meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Daniel Carden Elizabeth Johnson Emily Milan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7731.

td.p: Daniel Carden, a newspaper reporter from Indianapolis, Indiana
Elizabeth Johnson, a communications & marketing manager from Lansing, Michigan
Emily Milan, a nanny from Birmingham, Michigan (whose 3-day cash winnings total $45,001)

tr.td: ON A NORDIC TRACK
WORDS & THEIR MEANINGS
THREE FOR THE MONEY
PLANETARY FACTS
RICH EXPERIENCES
REESE WITHERSPOON MOVIES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Sogne is Norway\'s longest one of these long, narrow sea inlets, extending nearly 130 miles inland')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Sogne is Norway's longest one of these long, narrow sea inlets, extending nearly 130 miles inland

Elizabeth

div.onmouseover:

...

$12,800

$14,201
the Department of Justice')
